name: The Forest (itch) (Andrew Petersell)
description:
A short work of horror flash-fiction inspired by the work of Kitty Horrorshow, and my first true foray into 3D game-making! Explore a dismal forest full of dark secrets, and discover the hopeless plight of those who once lived there.  But most importantly, be wary of the trees.  They are not to be trusted.

Made with Unity.

Controls:
WASD + Mouse.
